item.description:
Happy New Year Packers,

Not the best way to end the regular season but this Saturday we have a chance to redeem ourselves and beat the Vikings at home, as usual we will be meeting at the Banshee but this week both floors will be 100% Packer, all TVâ€™s, all sound will be Green Bay. You will also be glad to hear that we have replaced the TV on the 2nd floor so everything is back up to speed now, we are all very excited here for playoff football so get to the pub early and claim your seat. Please reply with any suggestions or concerns, have a great week.

Go Pack,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Playoff Football Vikings @ Packers
